testcase.name: analyze(folderPath, callback) should return an error in case a path to invalid folder was provided
testcase.classname: should return an error in case a path to invalid folder was provided

testcase.name: analyze(folderPath, callback) should call callback function once
analyze(folderPath, callback) should pass null as an error in case of a success
testcase.classname: should pass null as an error in case of a success

testcase.name: analyze(folderPath, callback) should pass an object that has totalFiles number property
testcase.classname: should pass an object that has totalFiles number property

testcase.name: analyze(folderPath, callback) should pass an object that has totalSubFolders number property
testcase.classname: should pass an object that has totalSubFolders number property

testcase.name: analyze(folderPath, callback) should pass an object that has fileTypesInformation array property
testcase.classname: should pass an object that has fileTypesInformation array property

testcase.name: analyze(folderPath, callback) should pass correct format of objects for fileTypesInformation array
testcase.classname: should pass correct format of objects for fileTypesInformation array

testcase.name: analyze(folderPath, callback) should pass correct totalFiles value
analyze(folderPath, callback) should pass correct totalSubFolders value
analyze(folderPath, callback) should pass fileTypesInformation array that has correct information about extension
testcase.classname: should pass fileTypesInformation array that has correct information about extension

testcase.name: CLI It should exit with non-zero code (Throw an error) if passed incorrect command name
testcase.classname: It should exit with non-zero code (Throw an error) if passed incorrect command name

testcase.name: CLI It should exit with non-zero code (Throw an error) if passed incorrect arguments for rimraf command
testcase.classname: It should exit with non-zero code (Throw an error) if passed incorrect arguments for rimraf command

testcase.name: CLI It should exit with non-zero code (Throw an error) if passed incorrect arguments for rename command
testcase.classname: It should exit with non-zero code (Throw an error) if passed incorrect arguments for rename command

testcase.name: CLI It should delete a folder with all it content when using rimraf command.
testcase.classname: It should delete a folder with all it content when using rimraf command.

testcase.name: CLI It should delete a file when using rimraf command.
testcase.classname: It should delete a file when using rimraf command.

testcase.name: CLI It should rename a file when using rename command.
testcase.classname: It should rename a file when using rename command.

testcase.name: CLI It should rename a folder when using rename command.
testcase.classname: It should rename a folder when using rename command.
